 A commutativity law for substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1997.) (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 22-Mar-2018.)
statement: sbcom $p |- ( [ y / z ] [ y / x ] ph <-> [ y / x ] [ y / z ] ph ) $.
